org.springframework.kafka.listener

接口 ConsumerAwareListenerErrorHandler

  • 所有超级接口:
    KafkaListenerErrorHandler
    函数接口:
    这是一个函数接口, 因此可用作 lambda 表达式或方法引用的赋值目标。

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface ConsumerAwareListenerErrorHandler
extends KafkaListenerErrorHandler
    An error handler that has access to the consumer, for example to adjust offsets after an error.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.0

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      default java.lang.Object handleError(org.springframework.messaging.Message<?> message, ListenerExecutionFailedException exception)
      Handle the error.
      java.lang.Object handleError(org.springframework.messaging.Message<?> message, ListenerExecutionFailedException exception, org.apache.kafka.clients.consumer.Consumer<?,?> consumer)
      Handle the error.

    • 方法详细资料

      • handleError

        default java.lang.Object handleError(org.springframework.messaging.Message<?> message,
                                     ListenerExecutionFailedException exception)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: KafkaListenerErrorHandler
        Handle the error.
        指定者:
        handleError 在接口中 KafkaListenerErrorHandler
        参数:
        message - the spring-messaging message.
        exception - the exception the listener threw, wrapped in a ListenerExecutionFailedException.
        返回:
        the return value is ignored unless the annoated method has a @SendTo annotation.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - an exception which may be the original or different.

      • handleError

        java.lang.Object handleError(org.springframework.messaging.Message<?> message,
                             ListenerExecutionFailedException exception,
                             org.apache.kafka.clients.consumer.Consumer<?,?> consumer)
        从接口复制的说明: KafkaListenerErrorHandler
        Handle the error.
        指定者:
        handleError 在接口中 KafkaListenerErrorHandler
        参数:
        message - the spring-messaging message.
        exception - the exception the listener threw, wrapped in a ListenerExecutionFailedException.
        consumer - the consumer.
        返回:
        the return value is ignored unless the annoated method has a @SendTo annotation.
